thread.title: Guess & Co. Corporation Names Tiffany Bolling, Esq. General Counsel

author: cnbc.com
title: Guess & Co. Corporation Names Tiffany Bolling, Esq. General Counsel
text:
Durham, North Carolina, Feb. 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Guess & Co. Corporation a global diversified development and infrastructure company based in Durham, North Carolina, is pleased to announce that Tiffany Bolling, Esq. has been named General Counsel. Ms. Bolling is a licensed lawyer and she is admitted to practice law in the State of North Carolina. She earned a Bachelor's degree in History from the University of Virginia and her law degree from Charlotte School of Law. Ms. Bolling joined Guess & Co. Corporation as Interim Executive Vice-President and Interim Counsel before becoming Interim Executive Vice-President and Interim General Counsel. She later became Senior Executive Vice-President and Chief Counsel Officer. In that position, she became engaged in management of the Company while also providing legal advice. Ms. Bolling was appointed General Counsel to oversee the Company's Office of the Counsel. Prior to becoming counsel for the company, Ms. Bolling gained valuable legal experience as a defense lawyer handling civil and criminal litigation as an associate with a Charlotte area law firm. As General Counsel, Ms. Bolling directly oversees and handles all legal matters for the Company including the management of outside counsel relationships.
Tiffany Bolling, Esq. General Counsel Guess & Co. Corporation
About Guess & Co. Corporation
Guess & Co. Corporation is a global diversified development and infrastructure company that revitalizes communities and supports governments and private sector entities through its four primary business units: the Energy Group, the Industrial Group, the Health Care Group and the Real Estate Group. We are based in Durham, North Carolina and conduct business in the United States and abroad. Most of our businesses are built organically, and we pursue acquisitions of existing companies that will create value for our customers, employees, shareholders and communities that we serve. For more information, visit www.guessandco.com
